content/perfect-now-vs-perfect-later.jso.title: Perfect Now vs Perfect Later
content/perfect-now-vs-perfect-later.jso.preview: Our frontend code had duplication stemming from over-eager classical inheritance patterns. There were multiple levels of inheritance that had to be traversed to understand how a certain page’s logic would differ from another, very similar page.

content/a-sensible-approach-to-developin.title: A Sensible Approach to Developing Product Features
content/a-sensible-approach-to-developin.preview: It works, it’s reliable, it’s fast, and it feels great!
